name: 8. Open Notification Setting, select one branch, all position, all employee name and add

testSteps.description: [1] {notificationMenu=Notification Setting, parentMenuText=Notification, number=4009912, string=123456, lang=en, addBtn=Add, successSave=Save successfully, deleteSuccess=Delete successfully, viewNotificationsNotVisible=Not Visible, viewNotificationsVisible=Visible}

children.description: And I input my credentials username 4009912 and password 123456
And I change language to en
And I open submenu Notification Setting of parent menu Notification
Then The system should open 'Notification' page
When In Notification Setting screen, I delete all in table notification, show message Delete successfully

And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below
| valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName |
| random | All position | All employee |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
Then In Notification Setting screen, System show message Save successfully
And In Notification Setting screen, Table in the right have all employee in Employee Name added
And In Notification Setting screen, I delete random in table notification, show message Delete successfully
When In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
And In Notification Setting screen, System show message Save successfully
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table in the right have all employee in Employee Name added

userStory.narrative:
As an developer
I want to be able to run simplified feature
So that I can debug quickly
